items.title: Single Sign-On System and DevOps
items.description: Developed a secure SSO system with OAuth2.0, Keycloak, and automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, GitLab, Docker, and Nginx. APIs documented with Swagger UI.

items.title: E-Commerce Management System
items.description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution with product management, user authentication, and order processing capabilities.

items.title: Accessories Store Management System
items.description: An inventory and sales management system for accessories stores.

items.title: GIC Coffee Management System
items.description: A system for managing coffee shop operations, including inventory, sales, and customer management.
